title: ERROR - Failed to process gossiped attestation
body:
Been seeing this periodically: 78 times in the last 24 hours. The messages occur in rapid clusters of 20+ within a few seconds, with long periods of quiet in between.

Others have also reported this. I suspect it should be handled at DEBUG level without troubling the INFO logs:

Version: `teku/v0.12.6-dev-8167a9d4/linux-x86_64/-privatebuild-openjdk64bitservervm-java-13`

```
11:24:25.265 ERROR - Failed to process gossiped attestation.
java.util.concurrent.CompletionException: tech.pegasys.teku.datastructures.forkchoice.InvalidCheckpointException: Checkpoint state must be at or prior to checkpoint slot boundary
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.encodeThrowable(CompletableFuture.java:314) ~[?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniApplyNow(CompletableFuture.java:683) ~[?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniApplyStage(CompletableFuture.java:658) ~[?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.thenApply(CompletableFuture.java:2165) ~[?:?]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.thenApply(SafeFuture.java:329) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-0.12.6-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.6-dev-8167a9d4]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.core.stategenerator.CheckpointStateTask.performTask(CheckpointStateTask.java:86) ~[teku-ethereum-core-0.12.6-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.6-dev-8167a9d4]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.ofComposed(SafeFuture.java:85) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-0.12.6-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.6-dev-8167a9d4]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.ScheduledExecutorAsyncRunner.lambda$createRunnableForAction$1(ScheduledExecutorAsyncRunner.java:119) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-0.12.6-SNAPSHO>
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1128) [?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:628) [?:?]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:830) [?:?]
Caused by: tech.pegasys.teku.datastructures.forkchoice.InvalidCheckpointException: Checkpoint state must be at or prior to checkpoint slot boundary
        at tech.pegasys.teku.core.stategenerator.CheckpointStateTask.regenerateFromState(CheckpointStateTask.java:97) ~[teku-ethereum-core-0.12.6-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.6-dev-8167a9d4]
        at java.util.Optional.map(Optional.java:258) ~[?:?]

        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniApplyNow(CompletableFuture.java:680) ~[?:?]
        ... 9 more
11:24:25.265 ERROR - PLEASE FIX OR REPORT | Unexpected exception thrown for beaconchain-async-1
java.util.concurrent.CompletionException: tech.pegasys.teku.datastructures.forkchoice.InvalidCheckpointException: Checkpoint state must be at or prior to checkpoint slot boundary
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.encodeThrowable(CompletableFuture.java:314) ~[?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniApplyNow(CompletableFuture.java:683) ~[?:?]
```
